QuestData.Title: To the Depths
QuestData.Description: The Earthen Ring has identified the watery realm of Vashj'ir as a source of the adversary's destructive energies.$b$bIt is still uncertain what dangers might be faced there. Any information you could gather would be of great value.$b$bThe Horde is sending warships to the region as we speak. To gain passage, speak to Commander Thorak at Bladefist Bay.$b$bMay the spirits guide you, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Commander Thorak at Bladefist Bay in Durotar.
